response.overview: Who hasn't wanted to have sex with their good looking straight friend?!? Everyone, that's who! Well, BAIT BUDDIES is the DVD for you. Watch these guys trick their "Straight" friends into having sex with them when the "Girl" never shows up for their Sex Scene. Real life reactions to this fascinating storyline. What is even better is the "Straight" guys getting off with their Gay buddy just to make some cash! Catch this real live action scenario as it unfolds with every ending totally real and dfferent. After watching just one episode, you will be back begging for more! Collect the whole series! Better than Reality TV!
response.title: Baitbuddies: 2nd Edition
